meanings.definition: The quality or state of being doll-like or resembling a doll.
meanings.sent1: Her room was filled with dollishnesses, from the tiny dresses to the miniature tea sets.
meanings.sent2: The dollishnesses of the toy store attracted many young children.
meanings.sent3: The dollishnesses of the mannequins in the store made them seem almost alive.
meanings.sent4: The dollishnesses of the porcelain figurines gave the room a whimsical touch.
meanings.sent5: The dollishnesses of the puppet show delighted the audience.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or traits associated with dolls.
meanings.sent1: The dollishnesses of the doll included rosy cheeks and a bright smile.
meanings.sent2: She admired the dollishnesses of the antique doll collection.
meanings.sent3: The dollishnesses of the toy dolls made them look like little friends.
meanings.sent4: The dollishnesses of the dollhouse furniture added charm to the room.
meanings.sent5: The dollishnesses of the rag dolls made them endearing to children.
